inclusion.criterion: Laparoscopic surgical procedure of 2 hours duration requiring IV fluid administration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uncorrected plasma sodium level before surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diseases which cause abnormal ADH secretion

unknown
exclusion.evidence: Chest X-ray showed infiltrate in the middle of left lung with diameter of 1.8 cm with signs of cavitation

notes: Patient has TB, but no history of TB vaccination. He is a previously healthy man.
